Class Bytes

java.lang.Object
ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.util.Bytes
public final class Bytes extends Object
Utility methods for reading unsigned integers from byte arrays.
Since:
RADAR 0.1-doc

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static int
    u16be(byte[] a, int off)
    Reads an unsigned 16-bit big-endian value.
    static int
    u32be(byte[] a, int off)
    Reads an unsigned 32-bit big-endian value.
    static int
    u8(byte[] a, int off)
    Reads an unsigned 8-bit value.

    Methods inherited from class Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • u8

      public static int u8(byte[] a, int off)
      Reads an unsigned 8-bit value.
      Parameters:
      a - byte array source; may be null
      off - offset in the array
      Returns:
      unsigned value in the range [0,255] or 0 if out of bounds
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc

    • u16be

      public static int u16be(byte[] a, int off)
      Reads an unsigned 16-bit big-endian value.
      Parameters:
      a - byte array source; may be null
      off - offset of the first byte
      Returns:
      unsigned value or 0 when insufficient bytes remain
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc

    • u32be

      public static int u32be(byte[] a, int off)
      Reads an unsigned 32-bit big-endian value.
      Parameters:
      a - byte array source; may be null
      off - offset of the most significant byte
      Returns:
      unsigned value as an int (higher bits truncated) or 0 if out of bounds
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc
